trans-unit.source: Represents the data contained in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje dane zawarte w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Element skojarzony z tym węzłem równorzędnym automatyzacji.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Elementu równorzędnego automatyzacji, który jest skojarzony z <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> przechowuje <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera typ kontrolki dla <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem" /> Wartość wyliczenia.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera nazwę klasy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest wywoływana przez <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Nazwa klasy <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Wyliczenie wartość określająca wzorca formantu.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wzorzec kontroli <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> skojarzony z <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Obiekt, który obsługuje wzorca formantu, jeśli <paramref name="patternInterface" /> jest obsługiwaną wartością; w przeciwnym razie <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli wystąpi jedno z następujących przypadków, ta metoda zwraca obiekt, który obsługuje wzorca określonego formantu.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> has child objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` Equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse> i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> skojarzonego z tym <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> ma obiektów podrzędnych.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> does not have child objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` Equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> skojarzonego z tym <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> nie ma obiektów podrzędnych.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` Equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> skojarzonego z tym <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> dostępne do kontroli ustawioną właściwość `true`.

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> can be resized.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` Equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform> i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> skojarzonego z tym <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> można zmieniać.

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ukrywa wszystkie elementy, które znajdują się w <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> skojarzonego z tym <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ten element jest jawną implementacją członków.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Można go używać tylko wtedy, gdy <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> wystąpienia jest rzutowane na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interfejsu.
